# Distributed

> Distributed architecture oriented template

* ✅ Blazor WASM
* ✅ Rest & graphql sdk
* ✅ BFF (GraphQL gateway + reverse proxy + blazor host)
* ✅ "TodoApp" API service
* ✅ IAM (keycloak)
* ✅ Storage
* ✅ Postgres database
* ✅ OpenTelemetry (aspire + jaeger)
* ✅ Bus (rabbitMQ)
* ✅ Auto generated SDK (GraphQL + REST)
* ✅ IAC (docker + aspire)
* ✅ Light / Dark theme
* ✅ I18N
* ✅ Feature management
